text: (Allah) mikap paricuttamanavan; avan tan atiyarai paittul haramiliruntu (kahpattullahviliruntu tolaivilirukkum paittul mukattasilulla) masjitul aksavirku oriravil alaittuc cenran; (masjitul aksavin) currellaikalai nam apivirutti ceytirukkinrom; nam'mutaiya attatcikalai avarukkuk kanpippatarkaka (avvaru alaittuc cenrom); niccayamaka avan (yavarraiyum) ceviyuruvonakavum; parpponakavum irukkinran
